title: Blogging-Based Science Education for Enhancing Design Thinking Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and understanding of problem-solving processes
context.additional_context: A digital device-enabled environment supporting real-time collaboration and individual reflection.

learning_goals: Students can apply the five stages of design thinking (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test) to solve scientific problems
Students can systematically document and reflect on their personal practical experiences in the design thinking process through blogging
Students can improve the design thinking process and demonstrate creativity through peer feedback
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
